item.title: Need help plz
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

public void newmenu() //newmenu if (playerRights == 0) sendQuest("Remember to bring food to godwars!", 13760); sendQuest(""+ PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 13757); sendQuest("Your Status Is: Normal Player ", 13752); if (playerRights == 1) sendQuest("Remember to bring food to godwars!", 13760); sendQuest(""+ PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 13757); sendQuest("Your Status Is: @blu@ Moderator ", 13752); if (playerRights == 2) sendQuest("Remember to bring food to godwars!", 13760); sendQuest(""+ PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 13757); sendQuest("Your Status Is: @yel@ Adminstrator ", 13752); if (playerRights == 3) sendQuest("Remember to bring food to godwars!", 13760); sendQuest(""+ PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 13757); sendQuest("Your Status Is: @grn@ Owner", 13752); if (donator == 1) sendQuest("Remember to bring food to godwars!", 13760); sendQuest(""+ PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 13757); sendQuest("Your Status Is: @red@ $Donator$", 13752); showInterface(13750); flushOutStream();
